alert.note: Alert for Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:52AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Waupaca and eastern Shawano Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 651 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clintonville, or 11 miles southwest of Shawano, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Street flooding is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Embarrass around 700 AM CDT. Shawano and Navarino Wildlife Area around 720 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Buckbee, Lunds, Frazer Corners, Pella, Belle Plaine, Bonduel, Landstad, Shawano Lake, Caroline and Adams Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
